body_html:
After removing conda, pip pytorch (conda uninstall pytorch; pip uninstall torch torchvision), install pytorch 0.3.1 (via pip) & execute python collect_env.py, result still show torch, torchvision in both pip3 & conda.

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip3] numpy (1.13.3)
[pip3] numpydoc (0.6.0)
[pip3] torch (0.3.1)
[pip3] torchaudio (0.1)
[pip3] torchfile (0.1.0)
[pip3] torchvision (0.2.1)
[pip3] warpctc-pytorch (0.1)
[conda] torch 0.3.1
[conda] torchaudio 0.1
[conda] torchfile 0.1.0
[conda] torchvision 0.2.1
[conda] warpctc_pytorch 0.1

Versions of relevant libraries:

body:
After removing conda, pip pytorch (conda uninstall pytorch; pip uninstall torch torchvision), install pytorch 0.3.1 (via pip) & execute python collect_env.py, result still show torch, torchvision in both pip3 & conda.

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip3] numpy (1.13.3)
[pip3] numpydoc (0.6.0)
[pip3] torch (0.3.1)
[pip3] torchaudio (0.1)
[pip3] torchfile (0.1.0)
[pip3] torchvision (0.2.1)
[pip3] warpctc-pytorch (0.1)
[conda] torch                     0.3.1                     <pip>
[conda] torchaudio                0.1                       <pip>
[conda] torchfile                 0.1.0                     <pip>
[conda] torchvision               0.2.1                     <pip>
[conda] warpctc_pytorch           0.1                       <pip>
